authPages.signupSuccessMessage: The password is sent to your email

errors.Network Error: Server is not available. Check your internet connection.

catalog.whatToDo: To start track events, you need to connect one of our Catchers
catalog.whatIsCatcher: Catcher is a small script that will catch errors in your application and send it to Hawk.

catchers.nodejs: Track errors from the server application built on JS or TS
catchers.php: Can be connected as a standalone script or as a monolog provider
catchers.js: Advanced catcher with source maps support. Supports TS.
catchers.python: Small, simple and full-featured catcher for any kind of scripts.
catchers.go: Deadly simple and fast errors tracking

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.emailDescription: Max frequency is 1 alert in 10 min
notifications.receiveAllDescription: All event occurrences. Max frequency is 1 alert/min.
notifications.includingWordsDescription: Only events that includes passed words

channelDescriptions.emailEmptyWarning: To enable email notifications you need to fill an email in Account Settings

actionDescriptions.IssueAssigning: When someone will assign you to the task
actionDescriptions.WeeklyDigest: Most important events for passed week
actionDescriptions.SystemMessages: Only important messages from Hawk team

chooseTariffPlanDialog.title: Choose a plan
chooseTariffPlanDialog.description: All plans includes all available features. If you want a free unlimited access for non-profit products, contact us by team@hawk.so
chooseTariffPlanDialog.onSuccess: Workspace plan has been successfully changed
chooseTariffPlanDialog.onError: Unable to change workspace plan due to an error, please try again later
chooseTariffPlanDialog.confirmSetToFreePlanDescription: The old plan will be canceled. Unused errors and time will not be refunded.
chooseTariffPlanDialog.confirmSetToPaidPlanDescription: The old plan will be canceled. Unused errors and time will not be refunded. You will need to pay for a new tariff plan.

creationDialog.description: Workspace will contain your projects. You’ll able to invite team members to join workspace and access projects.
creationDialog.title: Organize new workspace

billing.autoPayIsOn: Autopay is on. The next payment date:

processPayment.description: This form allows you to fund the workspace’s balance. After selecting the amount you will be redirected to the payment service.

notifications.error: There was an error while paying

paymentDetails.title: Payment details
paymentDetails.description: You are about to purchase a monthly plan for the workspace. Your payment will be secured. We won’t access and store your wire transfer data. You will get an invoice on your email. Read more about pricing and payments.
paymentDetails.acceptPaymentAgreement: I understand and accept the payment agreement (required)
paymentDetails.didNotAccept: You need to accept the payment agreement to proceed with payment
paymentDetails.didNotAcceptRecurrentPaymentAgreement: You need to accept the recurrent payments agreement to proceed with payment
paymentDetails.didNotAcceptChargingEveryMonth: You need allow charges from your bank card every month to proceed with payment

autoProlongation.title: Auto prolongation
autoProlongation.description: You are about to subscribe for auto prolongation of the current plan of the workspace. That means that when the next payment date has come, the plan price will be automatically charged from your card. Read more in docs.
autoProlongation.acceptRecurrentPaymentAgreement: I understand and accept the recurrent payments agreement
autoProlongation.allowingChargesEveryMonth: I allow charges from my bank card every month

cloudPaymentsWidget.description: Payment for tariff "{tariffPlanName}" for {workspaceName} workspace for a month

event.notFound: Event not found. Probably it was archived.

errors.Something went wrong: Error occurred. Hawk just informed us about it.
